metadata.notes: Comprehensive Harrell's branded product catalog for professional turf/golf course management. Includes MAX (liquid fertilizers), Bio-MAX (biostimulants), SprayMAX (adjuvants/colorants), HydroMAX (wetting agents), CalMAX (amendments), Polyon (controlled-release granular), and custom blend granular fertilizers. NPK from product names/labels. Micronutrient data from guaranteed analysis labels where available.

harrells_max_12_0_0.application_notes: Liquid fertilizer with chelated iron and manganese plus stabilized nitrogen from UMAXX for dark green color. Foliar or soil application.

harrells_max_12_0_12.application_notes: General purpose liquid fertilizer providing 1:1 N to K ratio with UMAXX stabilized nitrogen. Helps plants withstand environmental stress.

harrells_max_18_3_6.application_notes: Complete NPK liquid fertilizer with UMAXX stabilized nitrogen and iron for consistent performance. Urea and nitrate nitrogen plus phosphorus and potassium.

harrells_max_n30_plus.application_notes: Non-clogging blend of nitrogen fertilizers with UMAXX nitrogen stabilizer and kelp extract. High nitrogen liquid for quick green-up.

harrells_max_long_iron_15_0_0.application_notes: High iron liquid with UMAXX stabilized nitrogen. Compatible with amine-based herbicides and most tank-mix partners. Most effective during active growth.

harrells_max_15_3_7.application_notes: Complete NPK liquid with 25% slow-release nitrogen for sustained feeding. Foliar and soil application on turf.

harrells_amino_iron.application_notes: Amino acid chelated iron for foliar application to prevent or correct micronutrient deficiencies in turf and ornamental plants.

harrells_biomax_4_0_0.application_notes: Professional-use advanced foliar nutrition with UMAXX. Contains nitrogen, iron, kelp extract and humic substances for enhanced soil biology and plant health.

harrells_biomax_7_0_7.application_notes: Contains nitrogen, potassium and micronutrients plus kelp extract as a food source for microbes. Foliar and soil application for turf health.

harrells_biomax_12_0_6.application_notes: Professional advanced nutrition with UMAXX for foliar and soil application. Provides nitrogen, potassium, iron, manganese, and beneficial organic compounds.

harrells_biomax_mycorrhizae_pro.application_notes: Concentrated mycorrhizal inoculant soil additive. Enhances root health and aids in nutrient uptake. Part of the Harrell's Bio-MAX line.

harrells_biomax_root_enhancer.application_notes: Blend of naturally occurring organic compounds and complexed iron (Fe) for foliar and soil application. Promotes root development.

harrells_earthmax_organic.application_notes: Organic foliar and soil additive with humic and fulvic acids. Aids in microbial activity, nutrient availability, and soil structure improvement.

harrells_earthmax_g.application_notes: Granular humate produced from ancient humus deposit. Uniformly screened for consistent application. Improves soil structure and microbial activity.

harrells_calmax_lime.application_notes: High calcium lime for turf and horticultural application. Delivers calcium to plant and soil, raises soil pH. Available in micro and coarse grade.

harrells_calmax_g.application_notes: Formulated with activated humic acid. Provides calcium and sulfate sulfur while aerating high CEC soils and decreasing excess sodium levels. Available in micro and coarse grade.

harrells_k_calmax_0_0_24.application_notes: Potassium fertilizer with activated humic acids to increase nutrient uptake. Contains calcium and sulfur. Micro grade for greens and fine turf.

harrells_hydromax_hydro90.application_notes: Soil surfactant for turfgrass and ornamentals. Reduces soil water repellency and improves infiltration. Once in the root zone, helps reduce localized dry spots.

harrells_hydromax_hydro90_g.application_notes: Granular soil surfactant for turfgrass and ornamentals. Reduces soil water repellency in the root zone. Helps reduce localized dry spots.

harrells_hydromax_hydrocure.application_notes: Soil surfactant treatment formulated to relieve existing water-related problems such as localized dry spots. Curative wetting agent.

harrells_hydromax_hydrocure_g.application_notes: Granular soil surfactant to relieve existing water-related problems and localized dry spots. Curative wetting agent.

harrells_hydromax_hydrocure_pellets.application_notes: Wetting agent pellets for curative treatment of localized dry spots. Dissolve in water and apply as a drench for targeted treatment.

harrells_hydromax_hydroinject.application_notes: Designed to enhance infiltration and penetration of water applied through irrigation systems. Can be injected into irrigation lines for uniform coverage.

harrells_hydromax_supermax_pellets.application_notes: Non-ionic wetting agent pellet. Dissolve in water for drench application to relieve hydrophobic soil conditions and localized dry spots.

harrells_hydromax_rootmax_pellets.application_notes: Wetting agent pellets formulated to improve water movement into the rootzone. Dissolve in water and apply as drench.

harrells_spraymax_emerald_green.application_notes: Stable pigment to improve turf appearance and provide visual spray pattern indicator. Proprietary formulation aids uniform application of foliar fertilizers, PGRs, and herbicides.

harrells_spraymax_dormant_green.application_notes: Polymeric colorant for natural green color on non-dormant, semi-dormant and dormant turfgrass. Long-lasting color enhancement.

harrells_spraymax_dormant_green_plus.application_notes: Enhanced polymeric colorant for natural green color on non-dormant, semi-dormant and dormant turfgrass. Premium formulation.

harrells_spraymax_green_turf_paint.application_notes: Concentrated colorant for turf application. Can be applied to actively growing or dormant turf for natural green appearance.

harrells_spraymax_par_sg.application_notes: Highly concentrated stable pigment to improve turf appearance and provide visual spray pattern indicator. Premium formulation for golf courses.

harrells_spraymax_blue_spray_indicator.application_notes: Proprietary colorant blend as visual aid for spray coverage. Temporary identification of treated areas. For use with pesticides, fertilizers, and PGR applications.

harrells_spraymax_blue_spray_indicator_w.application_notes: Water-soluble packet blue spray indicator. Temporary visual aid for spray coverage identification. Convenient pre-measured packets.

harrells_spraymax_green_spray_indicator.application_notes: Proprietary colorant blend as visual aid for identifying spray coverage areas. Green color blends naturally with turf.

harrells_spraymax_super_concentrate_blue.application_notes: Super concentrated blue marker for chemical spray solutions on golf courses, parks, commercial and nursery applications.
Proprietary temporary colorant blend for marking chemical spray applications. Enhanced formulation.

harrells_spraymax_super_concentrate_gree.application_notes: Concentrated green spray solution and hydroseeding colorant for temporary marking of commercial spray applications.

harrells_spraymax_blue_pond_dye.application_notes: Blue pond dye for aesthetic improvement of ponds and water features. Reduces light penetration to inhibit algae growth.

harrells_spraymax_black_pond_dye.application_notes: Black pond dye for aesthetic improvement of ponds and water features. Creates reflective mirror-like appearance.

harrells_spraymax_nonionic_penetrant.application_notes: Increases pesticide and foliar fertilizer uptake by lowering surface tension of spray solution. Improves coverage and penetration.

harrells_spraymax_nonionic_penetrant_plu.application_notes: Low-foaming nonionic penetrant surfactant for use with plant protectants. Enhanced uptake and coverage.

harrells_spraymax_nonionic_spreader_stic.application_notes: Highly concentrated low-foam nonionic surfactant for agricultural and industrial products. Improves spray coverage and adhesion to leaf surfaces.

harrells_spraymax_siloxane_surfactant.application_notes: Nonionic organosilicone surfactant for use with fertilizer and pesticide spray applications on turf and ornamental plants. Superior spreading.

harrells_spraymax_activator_sa.application_notes: Adjuvant for contact and systemic plant protectant products and fertilizers. Enhances spray deposition and uptake.

harrells_spraymax_herbicide_activator.application_notes: Highly active ammonium sulfate solution to modify spray solution pH and water hardness. Ammoniacal nitrogen enhances herbicide activity.

harrells_spraymax_crop_oil_concentrate.application_notes: Blend of surfactant and nonphytotoxic agricultural spray oil for use with pesticides including herbicides, insecticides, and growth regulators.

harrells_spraymax_methylated_seed_oil.application_notes: For use with postemergence herbicides, desiccants, defoliants, and other pesticides. Methylated seed oil provides excellent cuticle penetration.

harrells_spraymax_ph_buffer.application_notes: Water conditioning agent that modifies pH and hardness of spray water. Hard water and high pH can reduce pesticide efficacy.

harrells_spraymax_defoamer.application_notes: Highly active nonionic silicone defoamer to eliminate foam in spray tanks and applications.

harrells_spraymax_defoamer_2.application_notes: Highly active nonionic silicone defoamer 2.0 formulation to eliminate foam in spray tanks. Updated formula.

harrells_spraymax_turf_marking_foam.application_notes: Foam marker that dissipates quickly without permanently discoloring sensitive grasses. Ideal for marking spray passes on fine turf.

harrells_spraymax_tank_cleaner.application_notes: Tank cleaner for spray equipment. Removes chemical residues between applications to prevent cross-contamination.

harrells_spraymax_pigment_cleaner_plus.application_notes: Cleans stains and residues including pigments, spray pattern indicators, soap scum, oil, and other deposits from equipment and surfaces.

harrells_lavender_scent.application_notes: Fragrance additive for spray applications. Lavender scent blend designed to mask chemical odors during professional turf applications.

harrells_divot_recovery_mix_tan.application_notes: Divot repair sand/seed mix in tan color for fairway and tee divot recovery. Fill divots to grade and water in.

harrells_divot_recovery_mix_green.application_notes: Divot repair sand/seed mix in green color for fairway and tee divot recovery. Green colorant provides immediate aesthetic improvement.

harrells_polyon_43_0_0.application_notes: 100% POLYON polymer-coated urea. Controlled-release nitrogen for extended feeding 8-12 weeks. Available in mini and regular SGN.

harrells_polyon_44_0_0.application_notes: 100% POLYON polymer-coated urea (PCU 44). Controlled-release nitrogen for 10-14 week feeding. Regular SGN.

harrells_polyon_42_0_0.application_notes: 100% POLYON polymer-coated urea (PCU 42). Controlled-release nitrogen for 6-8 week feeding. Regular SGN.

harrells_polyon_41_0_0.application_notes: 100% POLYON polymer-coated urea (PCU 41). Mini SGN (120-170) for fine turf applications. Controlled-release 4-6 week feeding.

harrells_polyon_0_0_51_sop.application_notes: POLYON coated sulfate of potash for controlled-release potassium. Contains 17% sulfur. Mini SGN for fine turf.

harrells_polyon_0_0_50_sop.application_notes: POLYON coated sulfate of potash. Micro SGN (80-100) for greens-grade applications. Controlled-release potassium with sulfur.

harrells_polyon_0_0_59.application_notes: POLYON polymer-coated muriate of potash. Controlled-release potassium for extended feeding. Regular SGN.

harrells_polyon_30_0_10.application_notes: POLYON controlled-release N-K blend with 75-90% PCU nitrogen and 2% iron. Regular or mini SGN. Multiple formulations available.

harrells_polyon_25_0_15.application_notes: POLYON controlled-release N-K blend. 96-100% PCU 41 nitrogen with SOP potassium. Mini SGN for fine turf.

harrells_polyon_24_0_12.application_notes: POLYON controlled-release with iron and manganese. Multiple formulations available with 75-88% PCU nitrogen. Mini SGN.

harrells_polyon_24_0_15.application_notes: POLYON controlled-release N-K. Blended PCU 41/43 nitrogen with polymer-coated SOP. Mini SGN.

harrells_polyon_20_0_20_mini.application_notes: POLYON controlled-release 1:1 N-K ratio. 90% PCU 43 with SOP and 2% iron. Mini SGN for fine turf maintenance.

harrells_polyon_19_0_19_mini.application_notes: 100% PCU 43.5 nitrogen with SOP potassium and 2% iron. Mini SGN controlled-release for fairways and fine turf.

harrells_polyon_22_0_22_mini.application_notes: 75% POLYON 43 with SOP. Mini SGN controlled-release for balanced N-K maintenance programs.

harrells_polyon_29_0_10_mini.application_notes: 70% PCU 43.5 with SOP and 2% iron. Mini SGN controlled-release for golf course fairways.

harrells_polyon_30_3_11_mini.application_notes: 98% PCU 41 with MAP and SOP. Mini SGN complete NPK controlled-release blend.

harrells_polyon_25_5_15_mini.application_notes: 96% PCU 41 with MAP, SOP and micronutrients. Mini SGN complete NPK controlled-release with minors.

harrells_polyon_24_0_19_reg.application_notes: POLYON controlled-release blend with 50/50 PCU 42 and 43 with MOP and SOP. Regular SGN for lawns and sports turf.

harrells_polyon_25_3_14_reg.application_notes: 82% PCU 43 with polymer-coated MOP. Regular SGN controlled-release NPK for lawns and sports turf.

harrells_polyon_18_24_12_reg.application_notes: POLYON controlled-release starter fertilizer with high phosphorus. Regular SGN for new turf establishment and overseeding.

harrells_polyon_25_0_5_reg.application_notes: 50% POLYON slow-release nitrogen with 2% iron. Regular SGN for lawns and general turf maintenance.

harrells_blend_16_0_25_mini.application_notes: Custom blend with 50% UMAXX stabilized nitrogen and sulfate of potash. Mini SGN for fine turf. High K for stress tolerance.

harrells_blend_20_0_10_mini.application_notes: Custom blend with 77% UMAXX stabilized nitrogen and SOP potassium. Mini SGN for fairways and fine turf.

harrells_blend_15_0_30_micro.application_notes: High potassium controlled-release blend for stress hardening. 100% POLYON or BCMU + SOP. Micro SGN for greens.

harrells_blend_18_0_18_micro.application_notes: 1:1 N-K balanced maintenance blend. Available with 100% Nutralene or 40% MU/44% AS formulations. Micro SGN for greens and tees.

harrells_blend_20_0_20_micro.application_notes: 96% methylene urea slow-release nitrogen with SOP. Micro SGN for greens-grade application. Extended feeding.

harrells_blend_12_2_24_micro.application_notes: High potassium greens mix for stress preparation and recovery. Micro SGN for greens and tees.

harrells_blend_10_2_20_micro.application_notes: High potassium greens blend for fall/winter hardening programs. Micro SGN for greens and tees.

harrells_blend_13_1_13_micro.application_notes: Balanced N-K maintenance blend. Micro SGN for greens and tees. 1:1 N-K ratio.

harrells_blend_13_4_13_micro.application_notes: Complete NPK greens-grade blend with phosphorus. Micro SGN for greens, tees, and fine turf.

harrells_blend_0_0_7_5mg_micro.application_notes: POLYON controlled-release K-Mag blend. 5% magnesium for greens. Micro SGN.

harrells_blend_0_0_8_greens_mix.application_notes: POLYON controlled-release potassium greens mix. Micro SGN for putting greens potassium maintenance.

harrells_blend_0_0_22_kmag_reg.product_name: 0-0-22 K-Mag Sulfate of Potash Magnesia Regular
harrells_blend_0_0_22_kmag_reg.application_notes: K-Mag (sulfate of potash magnesia). Provides potassium, magnesium and sulfur. Regular or micro SGN.

harrells_blend_0_0_50_sop_reg.application_notes: Sulfate of potash. Chloride-free potassium source with 17% sulfur. Regular SGN. Also available in micro SGN.

harrells_blend_21_0_0_as_reg.application_notes: Ammonium sulfate providing 21% nitrogen and 24% sulfur. Available in regular and mini SGN. Acidifying nitrogen source.

harrells_blend_46_0_0_urea.application_notes: Granular urea, 46% nitrogen. Quick-release nitrogen source. Regular SGN. Also available as sprayable micro grade.

harrells_blend_47_0_0_umaxx.application_notes: UMAXX stabilized urea with nitrogen stabilizer for reduced volatilization and leaching. SN12 regular SGN.

harrells_blend_5_10_31_10fe.application_notes: POLYON controlled-release with 10% iron for enhanced color. High K and P for establishment and stress tolerance. Regular SGN.

harrells_blend_18_5_9_reg.application_notes: 50% methylene extended slow-release with SOP and complete micronutrient package. Regular SGN for lawns and sports turf.

harrells_blend_25_6_12_pro.application_notes: PROfertilizer complete NPK with iron and manganese. Regular SGN for lawns and sports turf maintenance.

harrells_blend_16_4_8_reg.application_notes: PROfertilizer general purpose complete NPK. Regular SGN for all-purpose turf application.

harrells_blend_34_0_5_reg.application_notes: High nitrogen POLYON controlled-release with low potassium. Regular SGN for lawns and landscape turf.

harrells_blend_h2_16_3_11_fairway.application_notes: POLYON PROfertilizer fairway special blend. Controlled-release complete NPK for golf course fairways. Regular SGN.

harrells_blend_h1772_15_5_15_fairway.application_notes: POLYON PROfertilizer fairway formula. Balanced NPK controlled-release for golf course fairways. Regular SGN.

harrells_blend_16_28_13_starter.application_notes: High phosphorus starter fertilizer with SOP. Regular SGN for new turf establishment, seeding, and sodding.

harrells_blend_8_4_24_sop_reg.application_notes: POLYON PROfertilizer high potassium blend with SOP. Regular SGN for winterizing and stress hardening programs.

harrells_blend_26_0_13_hydrogro_reg.application_notes: 75% POLYON controlled-release with Hydro Gro wetting agent incorporated. Regular SGN for lawns and sports turf.

harrells_soluble_20_20_20_umaxx.product_name: 20-20-20 Water Soluble with UMAXX and Minors
harrells_soluble_20_20_20_umaxx.application_notes: Water soluble complete NPK with UMAXX stabilized nitrogen and minor elements. For foliar or fertigation applications.

harrells_soluble_25_0_25_umaxx.product_name: 25-0-25 Water Soluble with UMAXX and Minors
harrells_soluble_25_0_25_umaxx.application_notes: Water soluble N-K with UMAXX stabilized nitrogen and minor elements. For foliar or fertigation applications. No phosphorus.

harrells_soluble_28_8_18_umaxx.product_name: 28-8-18 Water Soluble with UMAXX and Minors
harrells_soluble_28_8_18_umaxx.application_notes: Water soluble complete NPK with UMAXX and micronutrients. Higher N ratio for active growth periods.

harrells_blend_iron_oxysulphate_mini.application_notes: 50% iron oxy-sulphate granular for iron supplementation and turf color. Mini SGN. Helps lower soil pH.

harrells_manganese_sulfate.application_notes: Manganese sulfate granular for manganese deficiency correction. 32% Mn, 19% S. Available in regular and mini SGN.

harrells_iron_chelate_5pct.application_notes: 5% chelated iron granular for soil application. Corrects iron deficiency and enhances turf color.

harrells_sulphur_90.application_notes: 90% elemental sulfur for lowering soil pH. Regular SGN. Apply in multiple light applications.

harrells_florida_booster_plus.product_name: Florida Booster Plus Minor Element Package
harrells_florida_booster_plus.application_notes: Complete micronutrient package with iron, manganese, zinc, copper, boron, magnesium and sulfur. PROfertilizer for micronutrient supplementation.

harrells_tracer_micronutrient_mix.application_notes: Complete micronutrient blend for turf. Provides Fe, Mn, Zn, Cu, B, Mg, and S in a single granular product.

harrells_epsom_salts.application_notes: Soluble magnesium sulfate for foliar or soil application. Corrects magnesium deficiency. 10% Mg, 13% S.

harrells_aluminum_sulfate.application_notes: Aluminum sulfate for lowering soil pH. Contains 14% sulfur. More rapid pH reduction than elemental sulfur.

harrells_calcium_nitrate.application_notes: Tropicote coated calcium nitrate. 15.5% nitrate nitrogen and 19% calcium. Non-acidifying nitrogen source.

harrells_lime_pellet_calcitic.application_notes: Pelletized calcitic lime for raising soil pH. 36% calcium. Easy to spread with standard equipment.

harrells_pro_mag_36.application_notes: 36% magnesium oxide granular for magnesium supplementation and soil pH adjustment.

harrells_boron_granular.application_notes: Granular boron for soil application. Use low rates to avoid toxicity. 14.3% B.

harrells_soluble_boron.application_notes: Water soluble boron (Solubor) for foliar or soil application. 20.5% B. Apply at low rates.

harrells_triple_super_phosphate.application_notes: Triple super phosphate. 46% phosphorus (P2O5) with 15% calcium. For phosphorus supplementation and establishment. Regular SGN.

harrells_dap_18_46_0.application_notes: Diammonium phosphate providing 18% ammonium nitrogen and 46% phosphorus. For establishment and high-P needs. Regular SGN.

harrells_blend_0_0_11_micro.application_notes: Potassium plus micronutrient greens-grade blend. Iron, manganese, magnesium, and sulfur. Micro SGN for putting greens.

harrells_blend_6_2_0_micro.application_notes: Complete micronutrient package with low nitrogen and phosphorus. Micro SGN for greens supplementation.

harrells_blend_0_0_30_poly_micro.application_notes: POLYON controlled-release potassium. Micro SGN for greens-grade K supplementation.

harrells_blend_0_0_40_mini.application_notes: POLYON controlled-release potassium. Mini SGN for fine turf K programs.

harrells_blend_12_1_12_micro.application_notes: Balanced 1:1 N-K greens blend with low phosphorus. Micro SGN for greens and tees.

harrells_blend_18_0_9_reg.application_notes: 75% PCU 44 controlled-release with ammonium sulfate and SOP. Regular SGN for lawns and sports turf.

harrells_blend_18_1_9_micro.application_notes: Complete maintenance blend with micronutrients. Micro SGN for greens and tees. POLYON or MU slow-release.

harrells_blend_maxi_cal_s_micro.application_notes: Calcium sulfate (gypsum) micro grade. 22% calcium, 17% sulfur. Displaces sodium, adds calcium without raising pH.
